    template<class T>
class NameObject
{
	public:
		NameObject(std::string& name, const T& value);
		//oprator=ì€ ì„ ì–¸ë˜ì–´ ìˆì§€ ì•Šë‹¤.

	private:
		std::string& nameValue;
		const T objectValue;
}

int main()
{
	std::string newDog("DooBoo");
	std::string oldDog("BangWool");

	NameObject<int> p(newDog, 2);
	NameObject<int> s(oldDog, 36);

	p = s;
	return 0;
}
